name: Airborn
description:
Soar through the air and decimate their fleet. Fight off a never-ending onslaught of robotic enemies by combining devastating firepower and unparalleled mobility. An intuitive physical control scheme lets you pull off incredible aerial maneuvers at breakneck speed, while still keeping the experience comfortable for VR-sickness sufferers.

Choose the perfect combination of perks and armaments to turn yourself into the ultimate weapon. Unlock new equipment by completing challenges that will test you on your flight expertise, and your ability to pull off slick trickshots.

VR was made for this, you were born for this.
